headline: GM Vs Ford: Which Automaker is the Better Investment for 2026?
summary: GM stock has spiked 65% in the last year to new all-time highs of over $80 a share, with Ford shares up more than 40% and near a 52-week peak of $14.

headline: 1 Automobile Stock I'd Buy Before Rivian in 2026​
summary: Rivian is an innovative start-up, but its financials leave a lot to be desired.

headline: Will Ford Motor (F) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
summary: Ford Motor (F) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

headline: Did an Outdated Procedure Cause Rivian's 20K R1 Vehicle Recall?
summary: RIVN is recalling nearly 20,000 R1 vehicles after an outdated service procedure may have caused rear toe link issues.

headline: Ford’s Headquarters Skips Detroit, as GM Remains
summary: Both Ford and General Motors recently moved their headquarters. The latter remained in Detroit, while the former stayed in nearby Dearborn, Michigan.

headline: EVs for All America Releases New Report Showing Republican Resistance to EVs Easing Amid Job and China Concerns
summary: As President Donald Trump prepares to travel to Detroit this week to address the Detroit Economic Club and tour a Ford Motor Co. plant during the opening of the North American International Auto Show, new national research from EVs for All America finds that Americans' views on electric vehicles are evolving, with Republican resistance easing but concerns about jobs, China and affordability still shaping the market.

headline: Performance Brokerage Services Advises on the Sale of Team Chevrolet GMC in Alice, Texas from Mike Terry Auto Group to Payne Auto Group
summary: Performance Brokerage Services, North America's highest volume dealership brokerage firm, is pleased to announce the sale of Team Chevrolet GMC in Alice, Texas from Mike Terry Auto Group to Payne Auto Group.
